this year the $10 billion james web space telescope
has been taking
images of the universe since it arrived at the station
observed more than 1.6 million km from Earth
on October 24, 2020. This
is also the telescope with the
deepest and most cosmic imaging capabilities ever
produced. The first images were filtered
from James web  The
world's new and most powerful space telescope has just been
announced by the US space agency NASA
from an analysis of 4,000 galaxies.
I feel very excited about the
James web telescope we now have.
The ability to observe
beautiful images in the sky with a
giant 6.5 m long golden mirror. James web can
capture images of light from the
first stars and galaxies that were
formed long ago.  The 13.7 billion years of delay
due to the time it takes for light to travel has
unintentionally helped us obtain time-travel
images of objects in the
early universe, thereby going
further back in time than its predecessor.
Astronomers believe that
this advancement will help us have a
clearer view of the universe than before and
observe what the universe looked like after the
Big Bang 13.8 billion years ago.

black and white This festival is

combining many different cultures
and takes place from January 2 to 7
every
year black and white is one of the
Ancient festivals  Especially in the Americas, it originated
from the rituals of indigenous people with
dances to pray for good harvests when
the Spanish conquistadors arrived.
These ancient rituals mixed with the
Western culture of the Slaves.  Africa

ownership  with this festival I love the

and white so unique that it was

and intangible heritage of humanity  Not only

ladies and gentlemen, noon, October 7.
Ho Chi Minh City police and Long An police
continue to surround the area in Luong Hoa commune,
